name: Helium
headline: Self Improving Software
description:
Helium is building self-improving software ‚Äî AI that continuously experiments on key moments in the user funnel to boost revenue. Our first customer, a social app with 20M MAU, uses Helium to test new in-app paywalls to get more users to subscribe. 

Zach previously made $100M+ in growth experiments at Uber, Shishir led the first LLM features for Alexa, and Anish worked at Meta building ML to automatically experiment on ads, increasing Instagram ads conversion by 10%.

founders.name: Zach Witzel, Founder
founders.description: Made >$100M in growth experiments at Uber. Now building tryhelium.com to personalize upsell flows. We help consumer subscription companies double their conversion.

founders.name: Anish Doshi, Founder
founders.description:
Cofounder @ Helium.
Previously ML @ Meta, Apple, Alteryx, Berkeley.
Into ü•ä ,‚ôüÔ∏è, and üéπ

founders.name: Shishir Jakati, Founder
founders.description: Cofounder and CTO of Helium. Before Helium I worked at Amazon Alexa building predictive models to determine the quality of content and utterances spoken by Alexa, reducing cloud costs 10x. I love ML, LLMs, and MLOps - definitely reach out if I can help!

generated_description:
**Helium: Revolutionizing Paywall Management with AI**

Founded in 2024 and part of Y Combinator Batch S24, Helium is on a mission to create self-improving software that intelligently optimizes user experiences to boost revenue. Think of it as an AI that‚Äôs not just smart, but constantly learning and adapting to better serve users and businesses alike.

The company kicked off its journey by partnering with a social app boasting 20 million monthly active users (MAU), helping them test and refine their in-app paywalls to enhance subscription rates. It‚Äôs a smart approach‚Äîby experimenting on key moments in the user funnel, Helium aims to turn casual users into loyal subscribers with minimal developer intervention.

### The Team Behind the Magic
Helium is led by a trio of growth-savvy co-founders:
- **Zach Witzel**: Formerly at Uber, he has engineered over $100 million in growth experiments.
- **Shishir Jakati**: An ex-Amazon employee who pioneered large language model features for Alexa.
- **Anish Doshi**: Known for improving Instagram ads conversion by 10% through machine learning at Meta.

Together, they bring a wealth of experience in AI and growth hacking, which they leverage to help businesses scale effectively.

### What Helium Does
Helium‚Äôs platform allows businesses to manage their paywalls without needing extensive coding knowledge. Here‚Äôs what sets them apart:

- **Visual Editing**: Users can edit their paywall UI and content through a visual editor, making the optimization process seamless.
- **Rapid Implementation**: New paywalls can be triggered anywhere in an app with a simple line of code‚Äî`Helium.showPaywall('onboarding');`. This reduces the friction that often comes with developer teams iterating on user experiences.
- **Experimentation Made Easy**: Businesses can easily set up A/B tests, even going beyond simple comparisons to sophisticated multivariate tests.

### Get in Touch
If you‚Äôre looking to enhance your paywall strategy and improve conversions at lightning speed, Helium invites you to book a demo. They‚Äôre currently operating with a lean team of just three and are eager to showcase how their technology can work for you.

You can find more information and get on their waitlist at [Helium's website](https://tryhelium.com).

Helium is not just building software; they‚Äôre crafting an intelligent growth partner for businesses that want to thrive in a competitive landscape. With their expert team and cutting-edge technology, they‚Äôre poised to change the way we think about paywalls and conversions.
